Class AppointmentView

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.appointment.models.Appointment
com.group6.hms.app.screens.admin.AppointmentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventInterface, Serializable
public class AppointmentView extends Appointment implements EventInterface
The AppointmentView class represents a view of an appointment It extends the Appointment class and implements the EventInterface. It is responsible for encapsulating appointment details and providing methods to access event-related information.
See Also:

    • AppointmentView

      public AppointmentView(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, Availability availability, AppointmentStatus status)
      Constructs an AppointmentView with the specified patient, doctor, availability, and appointment status.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient associated with the appointment
      doctor - the doctor associated with the appointment
      availability - the availability schedule for the appointment
      status - the current status of the appointment
